ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest Spoilers Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Where on any of this site do you see those as spoilers ?  I don t know abotu you but the website I went to was advertising an EQ secrets manual that you can
ygData.messageBody:
Where on any of this site do you see those as "spoilers"?  I don't know abotu you but the website I went to was advertising an EQ secrets manual that you can download for $20.   And some of the things you list in your spoilers sound more like hacks than things SOE is planning on implementing.  So not to deter anyone from buying this download, but I'd be very careful and double check to make sure the things listed are legal and not going to get your account revoked.
 
 
Wulfric
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Craig Baldwin
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 13, 2004 7:50 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Everquest Spoilers Update

Sending a heads up on over 30 new spoilers of Everquest at

http://eq.onlinegamingstrategies.com

Fly: You can fly through the air in any direction like it is water.
Walk through doors and up walls: You no longer need any keys again.
Unsummonable: Make yourself unable to be summoned by enemy mobs.
Speed Changing: Change your speed from SOW to 5X max SOW.
Anti-Encumber: Never slow down from being overweight.
Fall with no damage: Prevent damage from falling.
Infinite Air: Why use a Fishbone Earring when you have this?
See Invisible: This allows you to see all invisible mobs.
Infravision: Weak human eyes? See like a dark elf
Prevent Weather: Tired of the rain in Greater Faydark? Now you can
stop it!
Hide, sneak, and pickpocket while attacking: The name says it all.
Hide and run: Be able to run and use your hide skill at the same
time.
Beg while invisible and attacking: As the name says.



http://eq.onlinegamingstrategies.com



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
